com.vanillasource.gerec

Interface Response

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ContentResponse<T>, ErrorResponse

    public interface Response
    A server response after interacting with a resource. The response contains methods to be able to make conditional requests. All the if..() methods produce request changers that can be supplied, potentially combined, to subsequent requests. All preconditions are checked on the server side, and will be answered with the HTTP error code 412 if not fulfilled.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AsyncResourceReference followLocation()
      Follow the 'Location' header received from the server.
      HttpStatusCode getStatusCode() 
      boolean hasAllow() 
      boolean hasIdentity() 
      boolean hasLastModified() 
      boolean hasLocation() 
      HttpRequest.HttpRequestChange ifMatch()
      Request processing will only be attempted if the resource matches the identity in this response.
      HttpRequest.HttpRequestChange ifModifiedSince()
      Request processing will only be attempted if the resource has been modified since this response.
      HttpRequest.HttpRequestChange ifModifiedSinceLastModified()
      Request will only be attempted if the resource has been modified since the last modified date in this response.
      HttpRequest.HttpRequestChange ifNotMatch()
      Request processing will only be attempted if the resource does not match the identity in this response.
      HttpRequest.HttpRequestChange ifUnmodifiedSince()
      Request processing will only be attempted if the resource has not been modified since this response.
      HttpRequest.HttpRequestChange ifUnmodifiedSinceLastModified()
      Request will only be attempted if the resource has not been modified since the last modified date in this response.
      boolean isDeleteAllowed() 
      boolean isGetAllowed() 
      boolean isHeadAllowed() 
      boolean isPostAllowed() 
      boolean isPutAllowed() 

    • Method Detail

      • getStatusCode

        HttpStatusCode getStatusCode()

      • hasIdentity

        boolean hasIdentity()
        Returns:
        True, if response contains an 'ETag', for using conditional requests based on identity.

      • ifMatch

        HttpRequest.HttpRequestChange ifMatch()
        Request processing will only be attempted if the resource matches the identity in this response. If response does not contain the identity, this method fails with an exception.

      • ifNotMatch

        HttpRequest.HttpRequestChange ifNotMatch()
        Request processing will only be attempted if the resource does not match the identity in this response. If response does not contain the identity, this method fails with an exception.

      • ifModifiedSince

        HttpRequest.HttpRequestChange ifModifiedSince()
        Request processing will only be attempted if the resource has been modified since this response.

      • ifUnmodifiedSince

        HttpRequest.HttpRequestChange ifUnmodifiedSince()
        Request processing will only be attempted if the resource has not been modified since this response.

      • hasLastModified

        boolean hasLastModified()
        Returns:
        True, if the 'Last-Modified' date was sent by the server.

      • ifModifiedSinceLastModified

        HttpRequest.HttpRequestChange ifModifiedSinceLastModified()
        Request will only be attempted if the resource has been modified since the last modified date in this response.

      • ifUnmodifiedSinceLastModified

        HttpRequest.HttpRequestChange ifUnmodifiedSinceLastModified()
        Request will only be attempted if the resource has not been modified since the last modified date in this response.

      • hasLocation

        boolean hasLocation()
        Returns:
        True, if the response contains a 'Location' header. This header indicates the content's URI.

      • hasAllow

        boolean hasAllow()
        Returns:
        True if the 'Allow' header is present. This is to be expected as response to OPTIONS request, for 405 (Method not allowed) response codes, and might be present for PUT requests relating to the created/modified resource.

      • isGetAllowed

        boolean isGetAllowed()

      • isPostAllowed

        boolean isPostAllowed()

      • isPutAllowed

        boolean isPutAllowed()

      • isDeleteAllowed

        boolean isDeleteAllowed()

      • isHeadAllowed

        boolean isHeadAllowed()

      • followLocation

        AsyncResourceReference followLocation()
        Follow the 'Location' header received from the server.
